segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink and it's disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is just getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked and it's just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted by the waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, but the water is a bigger issue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the drain isn't working properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
